definition: The term "unbestritten" refers to something that is widely acknowledged or accepted without any dispute or doubt. It is commonly used to describe a fact, statement, or quality that is unquestionable or undisputed by others.

examples.german: Die Tatsache, dass er der beste Spieler ist, ist unbestritten.
examples.english: The fact that he is the best player is undisputed.

examples.german: Seine Fähigkeiten als Redner sind unbestritten.
examples.english: His skills as a speaker are undisputed.

examples.german: Es ist unbestritten, dass sie die beste Lösung gefunden haben.
examples.english: It is undisputed that they have found the best solution.

examples.german: Die Bedeutung dieses Ereignisses ist unbestritten.
examples.english: The significance of this event is undisputed.

examples.german: Die Qualität ihrer Arbeit ist unbestritten.
examples.english: The quality of their work is undisputed.
